Class Roulette

java.lang.Object
com.example.mycasinofx.Model.games.Games

com.example.mycasinofx.Model.games.Roulette.Roulette
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameInterface, GameSetUpInterface
public class Roulette extends RouletteSetUp implements GameInterface
This class represents the logic of the Roulette game.

  • Method Details

    • getRoulette

      public static Roulette getRoulette()
      Retrieves the singleton instance of Roulette.
      Returns:
      The singleton instance of Roulette.

    • checkWinner

      public void checkWinner()
      Overrides the method to check the winner of the roulette game. It checks various conditions such as color, exact number, and even/odd bets to determine if the player wins and updates the player's balance accordingly.
      Specified by:
      checkWinner in interface GameInterface

    • generateResult

      public void generateResult()
      Overrides the method to generate the result of the roulette game. Sets the game status to true, generates a random result number, and sets the result in the resultGenericClass.
      Specified by:
      generateResult in interface GameInterface

      Returns:

    • returnStakeBeforeEnd

      public void returnStakeBeforeEnd()
      Returns the stake to the player before the game ends, if the game has not started. The stake is returned based on the types of bets made by the player. If the player bet on even, odd, red, black, or green, and the game has not started, the corresponding stake amount is returned to the player's balance. Additionally, if the player bet on exact numbers and the game has not started, the total stake amount for exact numbers is returned to the player's balance.

    • checkStartGame

      public boolean checkStartGame()
      Checks if the player can start the game based on whether they placed at least one stake.
      Returns:
      true if the player can start the game, otherwise false.

    • resetBooleanStake

      public void resetBooleanStake()
      Resets all boolean stake flags to false.
